edgruberman.bukkit.messagemanager
Class MessageManager

java.lang.Object
  edgruberman.bukkit.messagemanager.MessageManager

public final class MessageManager
extends java.lang.Object

Centralized logging and player communication API.

Instantiate this class in the plugin's main class as a public static variable and ensure it is set to an instance in the onEnable method.

Known Bug: Logging output for CONFIG level to file in Minecraft does not include level prefix tag despite it displaying in the console.

Author:
EdGruberman (ed@rjump.com)

Method Detail

setLogLevel

public void setLogLevel(MessageLevel level)
Configures logging to only display the specified level or higher.

Parameters:
level - Minimum logging level to show.

isLogLevel

public boolean isLogLevel(MessageLevel level)
Determines if current logging level will display log entries of the specified level or higher.

Parameters:
level - MessageLevel to determine if it will be displayed in the log or not.
Returns:
true if current logging level will display this level; false otherwise.

log

public void log(java.lang.String message)
Create an entry in the server log file. (Use configuration file defined default level.)

Parameters:
message - Text to display in log entry.

                java.lang.String message)
Create an entry in the server log file.

Parameters:
level - Logging level of log entry.

log

public void log(MessageLevel level,
                java.lang.String message,
                java.lang.Throwable e)
Create an entry in the server log file. (Include error information.)

Parameters:
level - Logging level of log entry.
message - Text to display in log entry.
e - Related error message to output along with log entry.

setSendLevel

public void setSendLevel(MessageLevel level)
Messages to players will only be displayed if equal to or higher than the defined level. Useful for removing player messages if feedback is not needed.

Parameters:
level - Minimum level of messages to forward to player.

isSendLevel

public boolean isSendLevel(MessageLevel level)
Determines if current send level will send players messages of the specified level or higher.

Parameters:
level - MessageLevel to determine if it will be displayed or not.
Returns:
true if current level will display this message; false otherwise.

send

public void send(Player player,
                 java.lang.String message)
Send a private message that only a single player can see. (Use configuration file defined default level and include timestamp.)

Parameters:
player - Target player to send message to.
message - Text to display on player's client interface.

                 MessageLevel level,
                 java.lang.String message)
Send a private message that only a single player can see. (Include timestamp.)

Parameters:

send

public void send(Player player,
                 MessageLevel level,
                 java.lang.String message,
                 boolean isTimestamped)
Send a private message that only a single player can see.

Parameters:
player - Player to target message to.
level - Importance level of message.
message - Text to display on player's client interface.
isTimestamped - Include timestamp in message.

respond

public void respond(CommandSender sender,
                    MessageLevel level,
                    java.lang.String message)
Determine where to send message to based on sender class type. If sender is a player, it will send to player, otherwise it assumes it is a console command sends the response to the log. (Include timestamp.)

Parameters:
sender - Original command sender.
level - Importance level of message.
message - Text to respond to sender with.

respond

public void respond(CommandSender sender,
                    MessageLevel level,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    boolean isTimestamped)
Determine where to send message to based on sender class type. If sender is a player, it will send to player, otherwise it assumes it is a console command sends the response to the log.

Parameters:
sender - Original command sender.
level - Importance level of message.
message - Text to respond to sender with.
isTimestamped - Include timestamp in message if sender is a player.

setBroadcastLevel

public void setBroadcastLevel(MessageLevel level)
Broadcasted messages will only be displayed if equal to or higher than the defined level. Useful for reducing public message clutter.

Parameters:
level - Minimum level of messages to broadcast.

isBroadcastLevel

public boolean isBroadcastLevel(MessageLevel level)
Determines if current broadcast level will broadcast messages of the specified level or higher.

Parameters:
level - MessageLevel to determine if it will be displayed or not.
Returns:
true if current level will display this message; false otherwise.

Broadcast a message that all players can see. (Use configuration file defined default level and include timestamp.)

message - Text to display players' client interface.
